name: Rot
passiveSkills: Immune to all Crave, Heal Block and Permadeath effects, including Silver and Innate effects
Permanently Increase Max HP on self by +100%
Inflict Bloodlust, Grievous Burn, Toxic Burn or Stop on a random enemy for 2 turns when you take damage
Take Additional True Damage equal to 5% of your MAX HP at the start of your turn
Heal self based on your MAX HP and MISSING HP and inflict Crave or Perfect Crave on each enemy for 1 turn after every action
Once per battle, Revive with Full HP and inflict Unblockable Stun and Innate Crave on a random enemy until they die upon death.
